title: (x) ImageInteriors billboard - Frutiger {Yves}
content:
Hi guys,

I’m wondering if you could help?

I’m trying to discover what font is used in the attached image. It’s pretty similar to Arial and seems to ’almost’ be Frutiger (apart from the differences in the ’O’).

Any ideas ?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409024846/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_0.jpg) | 37.74 KB |

 [‹ (x) Captain Morgan - Adobe Sans substitution font {Jason (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409024846/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14223 "Go to previous forum topic") ["The Boss" logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409024846/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14216 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gingamonkey

comments.content:
Yep! How silly do I feel !

Only difference is the dot on the ’I’, but I guess that was just tweaked by hand?

Thanks nicolai ;)
No... why do I always post _before_ I think?

It _is_ [Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409024846/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.107984.0.5&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=imageinteriors&sampleSize=32&attributes.paraSize=14&paraSize=14), mind you.

_I know I know, still catching up since TypeCon. I’ll get there soon._ :)

i always get frutiger and myriad confused.

doh!
